title: Mushroom and Walnut Turnovers
ingredients: ['375g pack ready-rolled puff pastry', '150g chopped walnuts', '15g unsalted butter', '2 tbsp double cream', '150g baby button mushrooms, chopped', '150g chestnut mushrooms, sliced', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '1/2 tsp dried mixed herbs', '1 egg yolk, lightly beaten with 1 tsp water', '1 tbsp sesame seeds']
